# borderType

**Instance Property**

A value that specifies the appearance of the scroll view’s border.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var borderType: NSBorderType { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBorderType] for a list of possible values.

## Managing Graphics Attributes

- **backgroundColor**: The color of the content view’s background.
- **drawsBackground**: A Boolean that indicates whether the scroll view draws its background.
- **documentCursor**: The content view’s document cursor.
